title: Elon Musk Ruffles Twitter’s Feathers
sub_head: Stock sinks almost back to pre-Elon level, but could go much further if deal dies
body:
Twitter ’s stock has lost its perch and hasn’t found a safe landing spot yet.
Elon Musk tweeted early Friday morning that his deal to buy the social network is “temporarily on hold” pending details of how the company calculates its user base.
